item.title: Arrow buyer
item.dc:creator: @bumfluff120 bumfluff120
item.description:
@bumfluff120 wrote:

[quote=“The Un-Named, post:6, topic:309”]Ok, sorry it took so long. I tried to make it to stop if you are out of coins or there is nothing in stock, but it wouldn’t work. Sorry.

[code](* Drag this to runescape ----------------------->^^^
Lighting dosen’t matter, but if it dosen’t work switch to V-Bright
32Bit colour

I do not take any responsibility if you get banned. The Un-Named*)
{.include squig2.txt}

const
AN = 0; // 0 = bronze, 1 = iron, 2 = steel, 3 = mith, 4 = addy

var
X, Y: Integer;

procedure GetArrows;
begin
if(FindColor(x, y, 2070783, 0, 0, 765, 505))then
repeat
if(AN=0)then //Bronze
repeat
MouseC(94+random(5), 84+random(5), 2)
MouseC(60+random(5), 155+random(5), 1)
until(False)
if(AN=1)then //Iron
repeat
MouseC(141+random(5), 85+random(5), 2)
MouseC(115+random(5), 156+random(5), 1)
until(False)
if(AN=2)then //Steel
repeat
MouseC(188+random(5), 86+random(5), 2)
MouseC(159+random(5), 153+random(5), 1)
until(False)
if(AN=3)then //Mith
repeat
MouseC(234+random(5), 83+random(5), 2)
MouseC(205+random(5), 154+random(5), 1)
until(False)
if(AN=4)then //Addy
repeat
MouseC(285+random(5), 84+random(5), 2)
MouseC(243+random(5), 156+random(5), 1)
until(False)
until(false)
end;

begin
GetArrows
end.[/code][/quote]

Looks great, thanks heaps, will try it soon

Read full topic

item.title: Arrow buyer
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Ok, sorry it took so long. I tried to make it to stop if you are out of coins or there is nothing in stock, but it wouldn’t work. Sorry.

[code](* Drag this to runescape ----------------------->^^^
Lighting dosen’t matter, but if it dosen’t work switch to V-Bright
32Bit colour

I do not take any responsibility if you get banned. The Un-Named*)
{.include squig2.txt}

const
AN = 0; // 0 = bronze, 1 = iron, 2 = steel, 3 = mith, 4 = addy

var
X, Y: Integer;

procedure GetArrows;
begin
if(FindColor(x, y, 2070783, 0, 0, 765, 505))then
repeat
if(AN=0)then //Bronze
repeat
MouseC(94+random(5), 84+random(5), 2)
MouseC(60+random(5), 155+random(5), 1)
until(False)
if(AN=1)then //Iron
repeat
MouseC(141+random(5), 85+random(5), 2)
MouseC(115+random(5), 156+random(5), 1)
until(False)
if(AN=2)then //Steel
repeat
MouseC(188+random(5), 86+random(5), 2)
MouseC(159+random(5), 153+random(5), 1)
until(False)
if(AN=3)then //Mith
repeat
MouseC(234+random(5), 83+random(5), 2)
MouseC(205+random(5), 154+random(5), 1)
until(False)
if(AN=4)then //Addy
repeat
MouseC(285+random(5), 84+random(5), 2)
MouseC(243+random(5), 156+random(5), 1)
until(False)
until(false)
end;

begin
GetArrows
end.[/code]

item.title: Arrow buyer
item.dc:creator: @bumfluff120 bumfluff120
item.description:
@bumfluff120 wrote:

[quote=“The Un-Named, post:4, topic:309”]Ok, to run this script you need SRL, it will buy arrows from Lowe in varrock and stop when there are 0 in stock or if you log out.

[code]{.include SRL\SRL.scar}

var
DTM: Integer;

begin
DTM := DTMFromString(‘78DA63BCCAC0C0D0CA8002FEFF87D08C503EE’ +
‘33520D14840CD6520514740CD5522D45C02120D44A869C1AF0600’ +
‘D06113FE’);
repeat
if(FindColor(x, y, 2070783, 298, 87, 481, 104))then
repeat
Mouse(226, 139, 5, 5, false)
Mouse(193, 207, 8, 8, true)
until(FindDtmIn(x, y, DTM, 200, 119, 245, 159))
if(not LoggedIn)then Exit;
until(false)
end.[/code][/quote]

Ok sorry, not to be picky or anything, but i have trouble running SRL, and i tried it it did nothing. Can you make one without SRL? If not thanks anyway.

PS need to have option of which arrow to buy.

Read full topic

item.title: Arrow buyer
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Ok, to run this script you need SRL, it will buy arrows from Lowe in varrock and stop when there are 0 in stock or if you log out.

[code]{.include SRL\SRL.scar}

var
DTM: Integer;

begin
DTM := DTMFromString(‘78DA63BCCAC0C0D0CA8002FEFF87D08C503EE’ +
‘33520D14840CD6520514740CD5522D45C02120D44A869C1AF0600’ +
‘D06113FE’);
repeat
if(FindColor(x, y, 2070783, 298, 87, 481, 104))then
repeat
Mouse(226, 139, 5, 5, false)
Mouse(193, 207, 8, 8, true)
until(FindDtmIn(x, y, DTM, 200, 119, 245, 159))
if(not LoggedIn)then Exit;
until(false)
end.[/code]

Read full topic
